price: 76. Que leurs propos ne t’affligent donc point ! Car Nous savons ce qu’ils gardent secret et ce qu’ils révèlent au grand jour.
arabic: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum innā naʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
